about_the_game:
Cut down hordes of enemies automatically in the Nomad Idle Demo, a spin-off of Nomad Survival. Engage in an expansive storyline, make impactful decisions, and grow stronger through various gameplay features that gradually unlock as you progress.

In the Nomad Idle Demo, you will have access to the following:

  • Level up and earn Stat Points which may be distributed within 7 unique Stats, allowing you to create a build

  • Discover, craft, and upgrade Equipment in order to make yourself stronger.

  • Conjure 1 of 4 Unique Summons to aid you in battle.

  • Select Passive Skills to be automatically used in battle, further defining your build.

  • Choose from 1 of 2 Characters, defining your active abilities and special perks for your playthrough.

The Nomad Idle Demo is an idle game, meaning that it mostly plays on its own. Your character moves and attacks enemies all on their own, but it can be played actively by making use of character-specific skills and abilities. Playing actively in this way is entirely optional and not mandatory, but can be effective in speeding up your progress or help you overcome challenges.
